headline: ALCATEL ROTARY VANE PUMP
description: Three Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump      Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model 3004
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Duty--Service Normal
Gas Ballast Yes
Motor Horsepower 3/4 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Type Hydrocarbon
Other Information

This pump is three stage.

Power Requirements 230/460 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
